Title: The Thorignir
Description:
The Thorignir of Stormheim have the strength and power to greatly aid us in defending Amirdrassil, but they have yet to come to the Dragon Isles. I suspect this... Odyn has interfered with their journey.

We will go and speak with their matriarch. Wrathion tells me her brood is amenable to your kind, and to assisting others. 

We will investigate.

Objectives.Text: Take the Portal in the Roasted Ram Inn
